_sText:
This map was made by striker0934, creator of 3stories2005. 

My work was:

1. Fixed the tunnels so you can fit there (Update broke them)
2. Added ramps and other places to the map
3. Added different textures
4. Added more Spawpoints
5. Added more ways to go to the other side
6. Added lighthning and effects
7. Added lamps and lights on the map
8. Added breakable glasses to engage the enemy by the lateral sides.
9. Added Skybox

Hope you like, it is very funny and addictive gameplay. You can plant C4 in the middle of the map
